page.description: When enabled, includes CORS headers in responses sent to origins making cross-site requests to the UX Component.

discussion.p: Checking *[ui:Add CORS headers]* exposes additional CORS settings you can configure:

item.name: [CORS allow origins]
item.description: A list of origins allowed to make requests to the UX component.

item.name: [CORS allow private network]
item.description: Enables cross origin requests from private networks to the UX component.
